quizzes.title: HTML & CSS Basics Quiz
quizzes.description: Test your understanding of HTML structure, semantic elements, and CSS styling fundamentals.

questionData.question: Which HTML tag is used for the largest heading?
questionData.explanation: The <h1> tag represents the largest heading in HTML, typically used for main page titles.

quizzes.title: JavaScript Fundamentals Quiz
quizzes.description: Evaluate your knowledge of JavaScript syntax, functions, and DOM manipulation.

questionData.question: Which of the following is the correct way to declare a variable in JavaScript?
questionData.explanation: The 'var' keyword is used to declare variables in JavaScript, though 'let' and 'const' are preferred in modern JavaScript.

quizzes.title: React Components & State Quiz
quizzes.description: Test your understanding of React components, state management, and hooks.

questionData.question: Which hook is used to manage state in functional React components?
questionData.explanation: useState is the primary hook for managing local state in functional React components.
